lead_paragraph: Forget about Dwight Howard's trouble at the line and Atlanta's off night from the field. The Hawks settled down in time to secure their first 3-0 start in five seasons.

headline.print_headline: Howard, Hawks Beat Kings for 3-0 Start
headline.main: Howard, Hawks Beat Kings for 3-0 Start
